skill.name: agent-creator
skill.description: Creates specialized AI agents with optimized system prompts using the official 4-phase SOP methodology from Desktop .claude-flow, combined with evidence-based prompting techniques and Claude Agent SDK implementation. Use this skill when creating production-ready agents for specific domains, workflows, or tasks requiring consistent high-quality performance with deeply embedded domain knowledge.
skill.summary: Creates specialized AI agents with optimized system prompts using the official 4-phase SOP methodology
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: Static analysis flagged 81 potential issues in documentation and diagram files. All findings are false positives: DOT files contain GraphViz workflow diagrams, SKILL.md is documentation with no executable code, and metadata fields triggered false positives. The skill is a prompt/documentation skill for agent creation with no actual security risks.

content.value_statement: Building AI agents with consistent, high-quality performance requires deep domain knowledge and optimized system prompts. This skill provides a structured 4-phase methodology to create production-ready agents with embedded expertise.
actual_capabilities: Creates AI agents using the official 4-phase SOP methodology from Desktop .claude-flow
Develops optimized system prompts with evidence-based prompting techniques
Implements agents using Claude Agent SDK for production deployments
Embeds deep domain knowledge into agent system prompts
Defines agent workflows, toolsets, and constraints for specific tasks
Validates agent configurations against best practices
limitations: Does not execute agent code - only generates agent configurations and prompts
Does not install or manage dependencies for created agents
Does not integrate with external APIs or services directly
Requires manual review and testing of generated agent prompts

use_cases.title: Build Domain-Specific Research Agents
use_cases.description: Create AI agents optimized for specific research domains like legal document review, scientific literature analysis, or market research. The agent embeds domain-specific terminology, constraints, and workflow patterns.

use_cases.title: Develop Code Review Automation Agents
use_cases.description: Generate specialized agents for code review tasks with embedded coding standards, language-specific rules, and security scanning patterns. Agents follow consistent review workflows.

use_cases.title: Create Customer Support Workflow Agents
use_cases.description: Build agents trained on support scripts, knowledge base content, and escalation procedures. These agents handle common queries with consistent responses and proper handoff logic.
use_cases.target_user: Support team leads and operations managers

prompt_templates.title: Basic Agent Creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new AI agent named [agent-name] for [task-description]. Use the 4-phase SOP methodology to define its system prompt with embedded domain knowledge about [domain-area].
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new agent project from scratch

prompt_templates.title: Agent with Tools
prompt_templates.prompt: Design an agent that can [primary-capability]. Include tools for [tool-list]. Define the agent constraints and response formats for [use-case].
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating an agent with specific tool requirements

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Phase Agent Workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an agent that follows this workflow: Phase 1 [phase-1-description], Phase 2 [phase-2-description], Phase 3 [phase-3-description]. Embed evidence-based prompting for quality outputs.

prompt_templates.title: Production-Ready Agent
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a production-ready Claude Code agent with: name=[agent-name], purpose=[purpose], constraints=[constraints], escalation-rules=[rules]. Include error handling and validation prompts.

output_examples.input: Create a code review agent for JavaScript projects
output: System Prompt: You are an expert JavaScript code reviewer...

output_examples.input: Build a research agent for medical literature
output: System Prompt: You are a medical research specialist...

output_examples.input: Design an agent for customer onboarding
output: System Prompt: You help new customers get started...

best_practices: Define clear agent boundaries and constraints before generating the system prompt
Use evidence-based prompting to embed verifiable domain knowledge
Test agent responses with edge cases before deployment
anti_patterns: Avoid creating agents without defined escalation paths for unknown inputs
Do not skip the 4-phase methodology for complex agent requirements
Avoid overloading agents with too many conflicting constraints

faq.question: What is the 4-phase SOP methodology?
faq.answer: The 4-phase SOP methodology structures agent creation into four phases: analysis, design, implementation, and validation. Each phase adds layers of domain knowledge and constraints to the system prompt.

faq.question: Can I use this skill with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill is compatible with Claude Code and generates agents using Claude Agent SDK patterns. The output includes ready-to-use configuration files.

faq.question: Does this skill execute code?
faq.answer: No. This skill generates agent configurations, system prompts, and documentation. You must manually implement and test the generated agent code.

faq.question: What makes evidence-based prompting different?
faq.answer: Evidence-based prompting requires agents to cite sources and verify claims. This improves response quality and makes agent outputs auditable and trustworthy.

faq.question: Can I modify generated prompts?
faq.answer: Yes. All generated prompts are templates meant for customization. Review and adjust constraints, workflows, and domain knowledge for your specific use case.

faq.question: How do I deploy created agents?
faq.answer: Export the generated system prompt and configuration. Deploy using your preferred method: Claude Code, custom integration, or Claude Agent SDK deployment pipeline.
